mapper.insert: INSERT INTO leave_request ( seq, member_id, leave_count, leave_code, start_leave_time, end_leave_time, reason, status ) VALUES ( leave_request_seq.NEXTVAL, #{member_id}, #{leave_count}, #{leave_code}, #{start_leave_time}, #{end_leave_time}, #{reason}, #{status} )
mapper.update: MERGE INTO leave_balance lb USING (SELECT #{memberId} AS id FROM dual) d ON (lb.id = d.id) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET userLeave = NVL(lb.userLeave, 0) + #{used} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (id, userLeave) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{used})
